DOC.HEADLINE: SLEEPING MAN ROLLS_OVER ONTO BABY DAUGHTER , CRITICALLY INJURING HER
DOC.TEXT: A man sleeping_in bed next to his 2-month-old daughter Sunday accidentally rolled_over onto the baby , crushing her , police said . The infant remained in critical condition at Children ' s Hospital of Orange County , according to police investigators . Police said they got a frantic call about 12:25 a.m. from the child ' s mother , who lives_in the 200 block of Avocado Street . She had just returned home from work , awakened her husband and discovered the infant pinned beneath him . The child , she told police , had stopped breathing . A dispatcher instructed the parents on how to perform cardiopulmonary_resuscitation on the child , police said . A team of officers arrived minutes later and continued efforts to revive the baby until paramedics arrived . The infant was first taken_to Hoag Hospital in Newport Beach , then moved to Children ' s Hospital in Orange . Police declined to release the names of the parents until the investigation is completed . Investigators said the incident appears to have been a freak accident .
